topic.title: Political views thread
topic.body: What are political views of this site?

1565678144_1GUhkGiS4PmRreV33ddFfEMqfdgjJ.body:
- violent
- they are racists
- white genocide

> [kidcourageous](#comment_2_1aaGBN84Cc8VE7iocUxPXiRVhx9qSfXw6): You're all wrong. Everything you listed also can apply to white trash. And that's why it's class that matters, not race.

What did you mean by saying "white trash"?

1565639249_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body: Did not communist imprisoned gays and people who did not want to work?
